item.title: Object
item.dc:creator: @Nuggi Nuggi
item.description:
@Nuggi wrote:

Now i add a new code with object like:

 else if (objectID == 2117) { //search = open (wall = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2875 && objectY == 9799)) {
  face = 0; //West
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 2623) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2924 && objectY == 9803)) {
  face = -2; //North
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 1558) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2898 && objectY == 9832)) {
  face = -1; //North
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 1557) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2898 && objectY == 9831)) {
  face = -3; //South
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 1542) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2892 && objectY == 9826)) {
  face = 0; //West
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 1544) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2893 && objectY == 9826)) {
  face = -2; //East
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 2143) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2889 && objectY == 9831)) {
  face = -1; //North
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}
 else if (objectID == 2144) { //open = open (gate = closed)
	if ((objectX == 2889 && objectY == 9830)) {
  face = -3; //South
	}//else = West (standard)
	ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), face,0);
}

if ((objectID == 9293) && (objectX == 2887) && (objectY == 9799)) //pipe1 in tav dungeon
{
sendMessage(“You crawl through the small pipe…”);
sendMessage(“You come out at the blue dragons!.”);
teleportToX = 2892;
teleportToY = 9799;
}
